question: 遼太
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Distant</kanji> <kanji>fat</kanji> makes up the Japanese given name <vocabulary>Ryota</vocabulary>. Imagine soccer player Noguchi Ryota (<ja>野口 遼太</ja>) kicking a fat soccer ball into the distance while voice actor Asari Ryota (<ja>浅利 遼太</ja>) commentates.
sourceReadingMnemonic:
This name uses the on'yomi for both kanji. You haven't learned this particular on'yomi for <ja>太</ja> yet though, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

<vocabulary>Ryota</vocabulary>'s diet consists only of <reading>ta</reading>cos (<ja>た</ja>). Tacos, tacos, tacos for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Yum!
